S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-4425: NPE with INSERT .. SELECT .. UNION and generated expressions
backporting change #831319 from trunk to 10.5.
This patch adds a test which confirms that DERBY-4425 is fixed. The code change which resolved DERBY-4425 was performed as part of fixing DERBY-4419, since the same code change fixes both symptoms, so this is a test-only patch.
subversion revision 831304 contains the DERBY-4419 code change.
